Translations.Text: Li dir Ki prevent vi el prostrating when mi ord vi? Li dir mi est put than li; Vi kre me el fajr kre him el kot
Li dir Do vi ir down vi ne est est arrogant here. Get vi debased
Li dir Grant me respite Tag Resurrection
Li dir Ekde Vi hav willed ke mi ir astray mi skulk them Your rekt path
Mi ven them el them behind them el their dekstr el their las Vi trov ke plej de them est unappreciative
Li dir Get therefrom despised defeated Those among them sekv vi mi fill Infer vi all
As por vi Adam logx your wife en Paradise mangx therefrom vi placx ne approach this 1 arb lest vi fal en pek
Diabl flustr them en ord reveal their korp est invisible al them. Li dir Your Lord ne forbid vi this arb prevent vi el igx angxel ating etern existence
Li jxur them mi don vi bon advice
LI TIEL duped them mensog As baldaux as ili gust arb their korp igx visible al them ili pen kovr foli Paradise! Their Lord vok them mi ne enjoin vi Did el ke arb avert vi diabl est your ardent enemy
